thread.title_full: Trump: 'Nobody Knew That Health Care Could Be So Complicated' - Fox Nation

title: Trump: 'Nobody Knew That Health Care Could Be So Complicated' - Fox Nation
text:
Trump: 'Nobody Knew That Health Care Could Be So Complicated' Published February 27, 2017 Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre 0 Email Print 
By Tom Howell Jr. | The Washington Times 
President Trump on Monday said Republicans are working out a “very good” plan to repeal and replace Obamacare before the party tackles tax reform, though he appeared to be caught off-guard by the magnitude of the fight. 
“It’s an unbelievably complex subject. Nobody knew that health care could be so complicated,” he told governors assembled at the White House. 
Yet for years, health care has been one of most challenging issues on Capitol Hill. President Obama and his Democratic allies weathered raucous tea party opposition before the passage of the Affordable Care Act in 2010, and then staved off a series of court challenges to the heart of the law.
